summary: THE ALL SEASON TIRES PROVIDED WITH THE NEW VEHICLE ARE USELESS ON SNOWY ICY MINNESOTA ROADS. VERY LONG STOPPING DISTANCE. TWO EXPERIENCED VAN DRIVERS NOTICED THE DIFFERENCE RIGHT AWAY. THE EXTRA SMALL TREAD TOWARD THE MIDDLE OF THE WIDE TIRES DOES LITTLE TO IMPROVE TRACTION FOR ACCELERATING FROM A PARKED POSITION. ALSO, SKIDDING IS MUCH MORE LIKELY WITH THESE TIRES. THE TIRES SHOULD HAVE MUCH DEEPER TREADS SINCE THEIR WIDTH GIVES LESS TRACTION.
